songs.title: Pantha (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Dappy & Light]
She tried take man for banter
Louis V, Gucci this like I'm Santa
Deep down, I know that she want me
So girl, stop with the frontin', yeah
Baddest in the black dress named Bianca
Oh, now you got me runnin' down, pantha
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Now come and put it 'pon me (yah)

[Verse 1: Light]
Νέο X6 μοιάζει με panda, eh
Νέοι, διάσημοι κι ωραίοι, μου 'πε θέλω να ζήσουμε για πάντα
Της είπα πες μου μόνο την αλήθεια και κοίτα με στα μάτια, yeah
Αγαπάς εμένα ή αγαπάς τη φήμη και τα φράγκα; (φήμη και τα φράγκα) ye-yeah
Με φωνάζουν big dripper (yah), big bottle sender (yah)
Όπου και να πάμε θα πληρώσω εγώ (wow)
Big face Rollie (yah), big body Benz
Big man like me, δε μου μοιάζεις καθόλου (ooh)
Άκουσα να λένε ότι με φτιάξανε
Οπότε πήγα και τους είπα να φτιάξουν έναν ακόμη
Πανηγυρίζω σαν να κέρδισα τη formula
Οπότε πήγα και τους είπα να φέρουν δέκα ακόμα

[Chorus: Dappy]
She tried take man for banter
Louis V, Gucci this like I'm Santa
Deep down, I know that she want me (deep down, I know)
So girl, stop with the frontin', yeah (stop)
Baddest in the black dress named Bianca (baddest)
Oh, now you got me runnin' down, pantha
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Now come and put it 'pon me

[Verse 2: Dappy]
See to me there’s nothing like her
She sheg me once, sheg me twice, hence why I’m still here tryna decipher
Is it your eccentric ways?
Or is it cause you got expensive taste?
She ain’t tryna kick it less you fly her out to the villa
In her head she must be thinking that she’s on to a winner
Fuck it I’ll admit it you the best I ever had
Shame your just out here tryna secure the bag
Σε περιμένω έξω στην βεράντα (περιμένω)
Do you hear me calling, why you always stalling
I know this shit 'cause of the pantha, yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Dappy]
Kitty kitty gon' be acting a different type of
Oh, now you're givin' me signs, feelin' the vibe
The waistline's got me for life, I'll do the time
Just say you ain't no ride or die
So you can never take what's mine, ah

[Chorus: Dappy]
She tried take man for banter (wow-oh-oh)
Louis V, Gucci this like I'm Santa (yea-yeah)
Deep down, I know that she want me (she wants me)
So girl, stop with the frontin', yeah
Baddest in the black dress named Bianca (Bianca)
Oh, now you got me runnin' down, pantha
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Now come and put it 'pon me (ye-eh-eh-eh-ah)

[Outro]
She a gangster, gangster
Ooh, hella banter, banter (Ayy)
I'm a G, I'm a G
But I'm cappin' for the panther, panther
Gangster, gangster
Ayy, she got banter, banter
Look, I'm a G, I'm a G
But I'm cappin' for the panther, panther
